com.kuka.roboticsAPI.applicationModel.tasks
Interface IRoboticsAPITaskManager

All Superinterfaces:
ITaskManager
public interface IRoboticsAPITaskManager
extends ITaskManager

Interface for accessing and managing tasks and applications in the RoboticsAPI.

This element is not in its final state and might change in future versions.

getTaskFunctions
